hero.subtitle: Creative solutions for your visual projects
hero.description: I am a professional passionate about transforming ideas into concrete projects. With an approach focused on clean design and innovation, I offer a comprehensive range of services to support your projects at every stage.

successMessage: Your request has been sent successfully! We will contact you soon.
errorMessage: Error sending your request. Please try again.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Professional visual solutions for your needs
services.photographyDescription: High-quality photography for events, products, and portraits
services.videoDescription: Professional video production and editing services
services.graphicsDescription: Creative graphic design solutions for your brand
services.printingDescription: High-quality printing services for all your needs

description.main: Our professional photography services combine technical expertise with artistic vision to create stunning images that tell your story. Whether you need commercial product shots, corporate headshots, or event coverage, we deliver exceptional quality that exceeds expectations.
description.equipment: Using state-of-the-art equipment and advanced lighting techniques, we ensure every image meets the highest professional standards. Our team of experienced photographers specializes in bringing out the best in every subject, creating compelling visuals that engage and inspire.
description.process: From pre-production planning to final delivery, we manage every aspect of the photography process with meticulous attention to detail. Our post-production team ensures perfect color correction, retouching, and enhancement while maintaining natural authenticity.

consultation.title: Initial Consultation
consultation.description: We discuss your vision, requirements, and desired outcomes to create a tailored photography plan.

planning.title: Planning & Preparation
planning.description: We scout locations, plan lighting setups, and prepare all necessary equipment for the shoot.

session.title: Photo Session
session.description: Professional photography session with expert direction and attention to detail.

postProduction.title: Post-Production
postProduction.description: Careful selection and professional editing of the best shots to achieve perfect results.

delivery.title: Delivery
delivery.description: Final images delivered in your preferred format, with options for prints and albums.

basic.name: Basic
basic.description: Perfect for small projects and personal shoots

professional.name: Professional
professional.description: Ideal for professional and commercial use

specialization.question: What types of photography do you specialize in?
specialization.answer: We specialize in commercial, event, portrait, and product photography, delivering professional results across all categories.

delivery.question: How long does it take to receive the final photos?
delivery.answer: Standard delivery is within 2 weeks. Rush delivery is available with our Premium package for delivery within 3-5 business days.

raw.question: Do you provide raw files?
raw.answer: Raw files are available with our Premium package or as an add-on to other packages. We recommend using our professionally edited photos for best results.

weather.question: What happens if it rains during an outdoor shoot?
weather.answer: We monitor weather conditions and will reschedule outdoor shoots if necessary, at no additional cost.

description.main: Our drone services offer a unique perspective for your projects, combining cutting-edge aerial technology and professional expertise. Whether you need aerial photography for real estate, construction site monitoring, or creative productions, we deliver stunning results from above.
description.equipment: We use professional drones equipped with high-resolution cameras to capture breathtaking aerial images, adding a new dimension to your visual content. Our certified drone pilots ensure safe, compliant operations while capturing the perfect shot.
description.process: From meticulous flight planning to professional post-production, we handle every aspect of aerial capture with precision and creativity. Our services include both photography and videography.

consultation.title: Project Planning
consultation.description: Needs assessment, location scouting, and flight plan development.

planning.title: Permits & Compliance
planning.description: Obtaining necessary permits and ensuring compliance with local drone regulations.

session.title: Aerial Capture
session.description: Professional drone operation to capture photos and videos from the best angles.

postProduction.title: Post-Production
postProduction.description: Expert editing and enhancement of aerial images and videos.

delivery.title: Final Delivery
delivery.description: Delivery of high-quality aerial content in your preferred format.

licence.question: Are you licensed for drone operations?
licence.answer: Yes, we hold all necessary licenses and insurance for commercial drone operations in compliance with local regulations.

weather.question: What weather conditions are suitable for drone flights?
weather.answer: We operate in clear weather with winds under 20 mph. Safety is our priority, and we will reschedule if conditions are unfavorable.

restricted.question: Can you fly in restricted areas?
restricted.answer: We can obtain special permissions for certain restricted areas where possible, but some areas may be permanently off-limits. We will assess this during planning.

turnaround.question: What is the typical turnaround time?
turnaround.answer: Standard delivery is within 1 to 2 weeks. Urgent delivery is available with our Premium package.

description.main: Our graphic design services create impactful visual solutions that help your brand stand out. From logos to complete visual identities, we deliver creative designs that effectively communicate your message.
description.equipment: With a deep understanding of design principles and current trends, we create visuals that are both aesthetically pleasing and strategically effective.
description.process: Every project is approached with creativity and close attention to detail, ensuring that your brand's visual elements work cohesively across all platforms and materials.

discovery.title: Discovery
discovery.description: Understanding your brand, target audience, and design objectives.

concept.title: Concept Development
concept.description: Creating initial design concepts and visual direction.

design.title: Design Creation
design.description: Developing detailed designs with professional attention to detail.

refinement.title: Refinement
refinement.description: Refining designs based on your feedback.

delivery.title: Final Delivery
delivery.description: Providing final files in all required formats.

formats.question: What file formats do you provide?
formats.answer: We provide all industry-standard formats, including AI, PSD, PDF, EPS, and JPG/PNG for web use.

rush.question: Do you offer rush services?
rush.answer: Yes, we offer rush services for urgent projects at an additional fee.

printing.question: Can you help with printing?
printing.answer: Yes, we can manage the entire printing process with our trusted partners.

illustrations.question: Do you create custom illustrations?
illustrations.answer: Yes, we offer custom illustration services for unique visual content.

description.main: Our printing services provide exceptional quality for all your printing needs. From business cards to large format displays, we ensure every printed item meets professional standards.
description.equipment: Using cutting-edge printing technology and premium materials, we produce printed materials that leave a lasting impression.
description.process: Our comprehensive services include expert color management, rigorous quality control, and finishing options to ensure your printed materials are flawless.

consultation.title: Consultation
consultation.description: Discussing your printing needs and specifications.

filePreparation.title: File Preparation
filePreparation.description: Ensuring your files meet professional printing standards.

proofReview.title: Proof Review
proofReview.description: Reviewing digital or physical proofs before final printing.

production.title: Production
production.description: High-quality printing with meticulous quality control.

finishingDelivery.title: Finishing & Delivery
finishingDelivery.description: Professional finishing touches and secure delivery.

methods.question: What printing methods do you use?
methods.answer: We offer digital, offset, and specialty printing methods depending on your needs and quantities.

paperOptions.question: What paper options do you offer?
paperOptions.answer: We offer a wide range of papers, from standard to premium, including recycled and specialty stocks.

rushPrinting.question: Do you offer rush printing?
rushPrinting.answer: Yes, we offer rush printing services for urgent projects at an additional fee.

largeQuantities.question: Can you handle large quantities?
largeQuantities.answer: Yes, we can manage both small and large print runs with consistent quality.

description.main: Our video production services transform your ideas into captivating visual stories. From concept to final delivery, we handle every aspect of video creation with professional expertise and creative excellence.
description.equipment: Using state-of-the-art equipment and advanced production techniques, we ensure your video content stands out with exceptional quality and engaging storytelling.
description.process: Whether it's a corporate video, an event, a commercial, or promotional content, our team delivers professional results that effectively communicate your message and achieve your objectives.

preProduction.title: Pre-Production
preProduction.description: Script development and detailed planning of your video project.

setup.title: Production Setup
setup.description: Location preparation, lighting setup, and equipment testing.

filming.title: Filming
filming.description: Professional video capture with high-end equipment and technical expertise.

postProduction.title: Post-Production
postProduction.description: Video editing, color grading, sound design, and special effects.

delivery.title: Final Delivery
delivery.description: Validation process and delivery in your preferred format.

premium.name: Premium
premium.description: Complete package for full video production

specialization.question: What types of videos do you produce?
specialization.answer: We produce corporate videos, commercials, product demonstrations, event coverage, and promotional content.

delivery.question: How long does video production take?
delivery.answer: Typical production time is 2 to 4 weeks, depending on the complexity and length of the project.

scriptWriting.question: Do you offer scriptwriting services?
scriptWriting.answer: Yes, we provide professional scriptwriting services to effectively convey your message.

subtitles.question: Can you add subtitles in multiple languages?
subtitles.answer: Yes, we can add subtitles in multiple languages and provide voice-over services.

description.main: Our web development services offer tailored digital solutions that help your business thrive online. We combine creative design with technical expertise to create websites that are not only aesthetic but also high-performance.
description.equipment: Using the latest technologies and best practices, we build responsive websites that provide an optimal user experience across all devices. Our development process focuses on creating scalable, secure, and maintainable solutions.
description.process: From e-commerce platforms to corporate websites, we manage projects of any complexity with a keen attention to detail and a focus on achieving your business goals. Our solutions include thorough testing and optimization for peak performance.

consultation.title: Discovery & Planning
consultation.description: Understanding your goals, target audience, and requirements to create a detailed project plan.

planning.title: Design Phase
planning.description: Creating wireframes and visual designs that align with your brand and objectives.

development.title: Development
development.description: Building your website using modern technologies and best practices.

testing.title: Testing & Optimization
testing.description: Thorough testing across devices and optimization for performance.

launch.title: Launch & Support
launch.description: Site deployment and ongoing maintenance and support services.

time.question: How long does it take to build a website?
time.answer: A typical website takes 4-8 weeks to complete, depending on complexity and requirements. Custom enterprise solutions may take longer.

hosting.question: Do you provide hosting and maintenance?
hosting.answer: Yes, we offer hosting and maintenance packages to keep your site secure and up-to-date.

selfUpdate.question: Can I update the site myself?
selfUpdate.answer: Yes, we provide a user-friendly content management system and training to help you manage your content.

seo.question: Is SEO included in the web design?
seo.answer: Basic SEO setup is included in all packages. Advanced SEO services are available with Business and Enterprise plans.

bio.title: Meet Brice Kamga
bio.content: Professional photographer and visual artist, Brice Kamga has over a decade of experience in creating exceptional visual content, blending aesthetics with strategy to capture the essence of every project.
